[Javascript console business quote]Takin.english: Taking many forms -religion, culture, philosophy- a doctrine may, when handled properly, cause a lasting impact on civilizations, reshaping minds and people and ensuring all future generations share a singular goal - the production, and acquisition, of more cookies.

[Upgrade quote 92]Empire biscuits.chinese: 小人不才，这是臣为陛下发扬饼干帝国的野心而准备的！

[Upgrade quote 94]Chocolate british tea.chinese: 但是巧克力牛奶是禁忌！不过巧克力口味的甜点就可以。

[Upgrade quote 95]Round british tea bisc.chinese: 这形状很容易掉进茶杯里，请不要把饼干架在茶杯沿上。

[Upgrade quote 96]Round chocolate britis.chinese: 只是加上巧克力并不能解决很容易掉进茶杯里的问题。

[Upgrade quote 97]Round british tea bisc.english: Yes, quite riveting indeed, old chap.
[Upgrade quote 97]Round british tea bisc.chinese: 添加个图案还是不能解决很容易掉进茶杯里的问题。

[Upgrade quote 98]Round chocolate britis.chinese: 我觉得我还是更喜欢饼干。

[Upgrade quote 99]Sugar bosons.chinese:
甜美酥脆的玻色子。
(绝对不是巧克力豆。)

[Upgrade quote 100]String theory.english: Reveals new insight about the true meaning of baking cookies (and, as a bonus, the structure of the universe).
[Upgrade quote 100]String theory.chinese:
科学终于可以解释烘焙饼干的真正意义了。
（不过也顺带解释了宇宙的结构）

[Upgrade quote 101]Large macaron collide.chinese: 配备了超级饼干同步加速器。

[Upgrade quote 102]Big bang bake.english: And that's how it all began.
[Upgrade quote 102]Big bang bake.chinese: 一切的一切都是从这一刻开始的。

[Upgrade quote 103]Antigrandmas.english: A mean antigrandma to vomit more cookies.
[Upgrade quote 103]Antigrandmas.chinese: 吝啬的老奶奶可以吐出更多的饼干。

[Upgrade quote 106]Palets.english:
You could probably play hockey with these.
I mean, you're welcome to try.
[Upgrade quote 106]Palets.chinese:
这东西大概能当冰球打。
我是说，你试试就知道了。

[Upgrade quote 107]Sabl&eacute;s.english: The name implies they're made of sand. But you know better, don't you?
[Upgrade quote 107]Sabl&eacute;s.chinese: 虽然表面上说是酥饼。但你比我更清楚实际上是什么材料做的。

[Upgrade quote 108]Kitten overseers.english: my purrpose is to serve you, sir

[Upgrade quote 109]Sextillion fingers.chinese:
有的时候
点击欲望
一触即发

[Upgrade quote 110]Double-thick glasses.english: Oh... so THAT's what I've been baking.
[Upgrade quote 110]Double-thick glasses.chinese: 喔……所以我原来一直在烤的是这玩意。

[Upgrade quote 111]Gingerbread scarecrow.english: Staring at your crops with mischievous glee.
[Upgrade quote 111]Gingerbread scarecrow.chinese: 始终带着调皮的笑容盯着你的田地。

[Upgrade quote 112]Recombobulators.english: A major part of cookie recombobulation.

[Upgrade quote 113]H-bomb mining.chinese: 效率实属可疑，但是实在是太炫酷了。

[Upgrade quote 114]Chocolate monoliths.english: My god. It's full of chocolate bars.
[Upgrade quote 114]Chocolate monoliths.chinese: 天哪。它何止是一级棒，简直是巧克力棒。

[Upgrade quote 115]Aqua crustulae.english:
Careful with the dosing - one drop too much and you get muffins.
And nobody likes muffins.
[Upgrade quote 115]Aqua crustulae.chinese:
称重的时候要小心——多掺了一滴水就变成了松饼。
而且没人喜欢松饼。

[Upgrade quote 116]Brane transplant.english: This refers to the practice of merging higher dimensional universes, or "branes", with our own, in order to facilitate transit (and harvesting of precious cookie dough).
[Upgrade quote 116]Brane transplant.chinese: 这是种能够将高维度宇宙和我们的宇宙连接起来的技术。这种高维度宇宙其实是一种成为“膜”的物体，连接后的膜将为我们提供更方便的运输手段（顺便可以从高维宇宙中收获宝贵的饼干面糊）。

[Upgrade quote 118]Reverse cyclotrons.english: These can uncollision particles and unspin atoms. For... uh... better flavor, and stuff.
[Upgrade quote 118]Reverse cyclotrons.chinese: 这些可以避免粒子碰撞和解除原子自旋，从而……呃………获得更好的口感，还是什么的。

[Upgrade quote 119]Unobtainium mouse.chinese: 那些不难得的老鼠大概已经足够用了。

[Upgrade quote 124]Perfect idling.english: It's the most beautiful thing I've ever seen.
[Upgrade quote 124]Perfect idling.chinese: 再也没有比这更完美的东西了。

[Upgrade quote 129]Heavenly chip secret.english:
Grants the knowledge of heavenly chips, and how to use them to make baking more efficient.
It's a secret to everyone.
[Upgrade quote 129]Heavenly chip secret.chinese:
上天赋予了你天堂碎片，还顺带快递给你了一本食谱《只需一招，简单利用天堂碎片提高烘焙效率》。
世上独此一本喔。

[Upgrade quote 130]Heavenly cookie stand.english: Don't forget to visit the heavenly lemonade stand afterwards. When afterlife gives you lemons...
[Upgrade quote 130]Heavenly cookie stand.chinese:
之后别忘了也去天堂柠檬水铺看看。毕竟天堂给你了柠檬……
你就可以把柠檬换成饼干币去店里买柠檬水了。

[Upgrade quote 131]Heavenly bakery.english: Also sells godly cakes and divine pastries. The pretzels aren't too bad either.
[Upgrade quote 131]Heavenly bakery.chinese: 这里也卖敬虔蛋糕和神圣点心。他们的椒盐脆饼也不错。

[Upgrade quote 132]Heavenly confectioner.english: They say angel bakers work there. They take angel lunch breaks and sometimes go on angel strikes.
[Upgrade quote 132]Heavenly confectioner.chinese: 据说有天使蛋糕师在这里工作。他们每天有固定的天使午休，不爽了偶尔也会天使罢工。

[Upgrade quote 133]Heavenly key.english:
This is the key to the pearly (and tasty) gates of pastry heaven, granting you access to your entire stockpile of heavenly chips for baking purposes.
May you use them wisely.
[Upgrade quote 133]Heavenly key.chinese:
这把钥匙能打开通往点心天堂的珍珠般的（亦或是可口的）大门。到时点心天堂的厨房仓库里有一大批天堂碎片等着你。
不过还是建议你计划好用量。

[Upgrade quote 134]Skull cookies.english: Wanna know something spooky? You've got one of these inside your head RIGHT NOW.
[Upgrade quote 134]Skull cookies.chinese: 想听个鬼故事吗？你脑子里现在就有个！

[Upgrade quote 135]Ghost cookies.english: They're something strange, but they look pretty good!
[Upgrade quote 135]Ghost cookies.chinese: 按理来说这些是残次品，不过看起来还是很好吃！

[Upgrade quote 136]Bat cookies.chinese: 这样的镇子配这样的饼干。

[Upgrade quote 137]Slime cookies.chinese:
难以置信的柔软！
不过小心别被粘住了。

[Upgrade quote 138]Pumpkin cookies.english: Not even pumpkin-flavored. Tastes like glazing. Yeugh.
[Upgrade quote 138]Pumpkin cookies.chinese: 连点南瓜味都没有。全是那层糖衣的味道。唉……

[Upgrade quote 139]Eyeball cookies.english: When you stare into the cookie, the cookie stares back at you.
[Upgrade quote 139]Eyeball cookies.chinese: 如果你盯着这饼干看，你会发现这饼干也在盯着你看。

[Upgrade quote 140]Spider cookies.english: You found the recipe on the web. They do whatever a cookie can.
[Upgrade quote 140]Spider cookies.chinese: 这是你在网上找到的食谱。倒是满足了作为饼干的所有条件。

[Upgrade quote 141]Persistent memory.chinese:
啊！我终于开始明白了！
和上次发现的一样！

[Upgrade quote 142]Wrinkler doormat.chinese: 怎么就让你说服我买这个了呢？

[Upgrade quote 143]Christmas tree biscui.chinese: 这又是谁橡树来的主意？

[Upgrade quote 144]Snowflake biscuits.english: Mass-produced to be unique in every way.

[Upgrade quote 145]Snowman biscuits.chinese: 上面撒了糖霜。不过可能看不太出来。

[Upgrade quote 146]Holly biscuits.english: You don't smooch under these ones. That would be the mistletoe (which, botanically, is a smellier variant of the mistlefinger).
[Upgrade quote 146]Holly biscuits.chinese: 冬青树上冬青果，冬青树下你和我。

[Upgrade quote 147]Candy cane biscuits.english:
It's two treats in one!
(Further inspection reveals the frosting does not actually taste like peppermint, but like mundane sugary frosting.)
[Upgrade quote 147]Candy cane biscuits.chinese:
一根糖果，两种口味！
（仔细尝了下发现两个颜色的味道并没有差别。都是普通的糖浆味而已。）

[Upgrade quote 148]Bell biscuits.english: What do these even have to do with christmas? Who cares, ring them in!
[Upgrade quote 148]Bell biscuits.chinese: 这钟和圣诞有什么关系吗？管它呢，反正很多人对这饼干情有独钟。

[Upgrade quote 149]Present biscuits.english: The prequel to future biscuits. Watch out!
[Upgrade quote 149]Present biscuits.chinese: 外物饼干的死敌。可要小心！

[Upgrade quote 150]Gingerbread men.english: You like to bite the legs off first, right? How about tearing off the arms? You sick monster.
[Upgrade quote 150]Gingerbread men.chinese:
你是喜欢先咬断腿呢？还是先撕断胳膊呢？
心理变态。

[Upgrade quote 151]Gingerbread trees.english: Evergreens in pastry form. Yule be surprised what you can come up with.
[Upgrade quote 151]Gingerbread trees.chinese: 甜点形态的常青树。我是搞不懂为什么大家都喜欢做姜紫的形状。

[Upgrade quote 152]A festive hat.english: Not a creature was stirring, not even a mouse.
[Upgrade quote 152]A festive hat.chinese: 叮叮当，叮叮当，铃儿响叮当。

[Upgrade quote 153]Increased merriness.english:
It turns out that the key to increased merriness, strangely enough, happens to be a good campfire and some s'mores.
You know what they say, after all; the s'more, the merrier.
[Upgrade quote 153]Increased merriness.chinese:
谁都没想到，快乐就是这么容易的东西。
只要大家和我们一起唱，快乐其实也没有什么道理。

[Upgrade quote 154]Improved jolliness.english:
A nice wobbly belly goes a long way.
You jolly?
[Upgrade quote 154]Improved jolliness.chinese:
挺着个大肚子走来走去的那位一直都是快乐的象征。
喔，我不是在说你。

[Upgrade quote 155]A lump of coal.english:
Some of the world's worst stocking stuffing.
I guess you could try starting your own little industrial revolution, or something?...
[Upgrade quote 155]A lump of coal.chinese:
你收到了这世界上最糟糕的礼物。
不过你大概可以试试用它发起一场工业革命，之类的……

[Upgrade quote 156]An itchy sweater.english: You don't know what's worse : the embarrassingly quaint "elf on reindeer" motif, or the fact that wearing it makes you feel like you're wrapped in a dead sasquatch.
[Upgrade quote 156]An itchy sweater.chinese: 都不知道该从哪吐槽好——是身前尴尬的驯鹿精灵图案？还是身上被狼人拥抱的触感？

[Upgrade quote 157]Reindeer baking groun.english: Male reindeer are from Mars; female reindeer are from venison.
[Upgrade quote 157]Reindeer baking groun.chinese: 雄驯鹿是从火星来的；雌驯鹿是鹿肉拼的。

[Upgrade quote 158]Weighted sleighs.english:
Hope it was worth the weight.
(Something something forced into cervidude)
[Upgrade quote 158]Weighted sleighs.chinese:
希望这漫长的研发能让用户开橇。
（可以随产品附带针对颈椎病的医疗保险）

[Upgrade quote 159]Ho ho ho-flavored fro.english: It's time to up the antler.
[Upgrade quote 159]Ho ho ho-flavored fro.chinese: 是时候为鹿茸誉奋力一搏了。

[Upgrade quote 160]Season savings.english:
By Santa's beard, what savings!
But who will save us?
[Upgrade quote 160]Season savings.chinese:
促销活动！可以用圣诞老人的胡须作为代金券！
但是谁来负责发放代金券呢？

[Upgrade quote 161]Toy workshop.english:
Watch yours-elf around elvesdroppers who might steal our production secrets.
Or elven worse!
[Upgrade quote 161]Toy workshop.chinese:
请随身携带好您的贵重物品，从指定地点有序地投放到圣诞老人的礼物袋子里。
想要用手机支付红包的顾客，请先兑换成现金再投放！

[Upgrade quote 162]Naughty list.english:
This list contains every unholy deed perpetuated by grandmakind.
He won't be checking this one twice.
Once. Once is enough.
[Upgrade quote 162]Naughty list.chinese:
这是份记录了所有老奶奶犯下的恶行的日志。
不过圣诞老人总是忘了云备份。
偷偷改两笔不会被发现的。

[Upgrade quote 163]Santa's bottomless ba.english: This is one bottom you can't check out.
[Upgrade quote 163]Santa's bottomless ba.chinese: 你这么说，我就更没底了。

[Upgrade quote 164]Santa's helpers.english:
Some choose to help hamburger; some choose to help you.
To each their own, I guess.
[Upgrade quote 164]Santa's helpers.chinese:
有的选择帮助汉堡；有的选择帮助你。
可能帮你也不是多坏的事吧。

[Upgrade quote 165]Santa's legacy.english: In the north pole, you gotta get the elves first. Then when you get the elves, you start making the toys. Then when you get the toys... then you get the cookies.
[Upgrade quote 165]Santa's legacy.chinese:
要去北极取经的话，你要先抓一只精灵。抓到精灵以后，要去学会做玩具。等你做出来玩具，你就会得到饼干……做的经书。
我也不知道精灵是用来做什么的。

[Upgrade quote 166]Santa's milk and cook.english: Part of Santa's dreadfully unbalanced diet.
[Upgrade quote 166]Santa's milk and cook.chinese: 不过是圣诞老人不均衡的饮食其中的一道菜罢了/

[Upgrade quote 167]Reindeer season.english: Go, Cheater! Go, Hacker and Faker!

[Upgrade quote 168]Santa's dominion.english:
My name is Claus, king of kings;
Look on my toys, ye Mighty, and despair!
[Upgrade quote 168]Santa's dominion.chinese:
吾名克劳斯，众王之王；
在我威武的玩具军团面前屈服吧！

[Upgrade quote 169]Pure heart biscuits.english:
Melty white chocolate
that says "I *like* like you".
[Upgrade quote 169]Pure heart biscuits.chinese:
快融化的白色巧克力。
上面写着："我真的真的喜欢你"。

[Upgrade quote 170]Ardent heart biscuits.english: A red hot cherry biscuit that will nudge the target of your affection in interesting directions.
[Upgrade quote 170]Ardent heart biscuits.chinese: 一个能将你的攻略路线往有趣的方向发展的火红色樱桃饼干。

[Upgrade quote 171]Sour heart biscuits.english: A bitter lime biscuit for the lonely and the heart-broken.
[Upgrade quote 171]Sour heart biscuits.chinese: 为孤独的失心之人准备的苦涩青柠饼干。

[Upgrade quote 172]Weeping heart biscuit.english: An ice-cold blueberry biscuit, symbol of a mending heart.
[Upgrade quote 172]Weeping heart biscuit.chinese: 冰镇的蓝莓饼干，是心灵缓慢修复的象征。

[Upgrade quote 173]Golden heart biscuits.english: A beautiful biscuit to symbolize kindness, true love, and sincerity.
[Upgrade quote 173]Golden heart biscuits.chinese: 一个象征着善良、挚爱与真诚的美丽饼干。

[Upgrade quote 174]Eternal heart biscuit.english: Silver icing for a very special someone you've liked for a long, long time.
[Upgrade quote 174]Eternal heart biscuit.chinese: 为了你钟意许久的心上人，光是这层银色糖衣，都准备了很长、很长时间。

[Upgrade quote 175]Gem polish.english:
Get rid of the grime and let more light in.
Truly, truly outrageous.
[Upgrade quote 175]Gem polish.chinese:
用心打磨瑕疵，让它闪闪发光。
而且是真的能闪瞎人眼的那种闪。

[Upgrade quote 176]9th color.english: Delve into untouched optical depths where even the mantis shrimp hasn't set an eye!
[Upgrade quote 176]9th color.chinese: 从光谱的终点发现的连变色龙都从未见过的独特色彩。

[Upgrade quote 177]Chocolate light.english:
Bask into its cocoalescence.
(Warning : may cause various interesting albeit deadly skin conditions.)
[Upgrade quote 177]Chocolate light.chinese:
沉浸在它的照射之中。
（警告：可能会引发各种有趣的皮肤病，个别情况有致命危险。）

[Upgrade quote 178]Grainbow.english: Remember the different grains using the handy Roy G. Biv mnemonic : R is for rice, O is for oats... uh, B for barley?...
[Upgrade quote 178]Grainbow.chinese: 想要记住所有谷物的名字，只需记下这个口诀：洪承皇滤倾斓孜

[Upgrade quote 179]Pure cosmic light.english: Your prisms now receive pristine, unadulterated photons from the other end of the universe.
[Upgrade quote 179]Pure cosmic light.chinese: 来自其他宇宙的纯正无暇的光子正在通过你的棱镜组。

[Upgrade quote 180]Rainbow grandmas.english: A luminous grandma to sparkle into cookies.
[Upgrade quote 180]Rainbow grandmas.chinese: 发光的老奶奶可以闪耀地变身成饼干。

[Upgrade quote 181]Season switcher.chinese:
因为世界上总有一个地方现在是正午。
所以世界上总有一个地方现在是圣诞。

[Upgrade quote 182]Festive biscuit.english: 'Twas the night before Christmas- or was it?
[Upgrade quote 182]Festive biscuit.chinese: 那是圣诞节的前一夜……来着？

[Upgrade quote 183]Ghostly biscuit.english:
spooky scary skeletons
will wake you with a boo
[Upgrade quote 183]Ghostly biscuit.chinese:
一只没有眼睛，一只没有尾巴，真奇怪！
真奇怪！

[Upgrade quote 184]Lovesick biscuit.english: Romance never goes out of fashion.

[Upgrade quote 300]Cookiemancy.english: There it is; the perfected school of baking magic. From summoning chips to hexing nuts, there is not a single part of cookie-making that hasn't been improved tenfold by magic tricks.
[Upgrade quote 300]Cookiemancy.chinese: 就是这里；完美的魔法烘焙学校。从召唤巧克力豆到诅咒各种坚果，饼干制作的任何一道工序都被魔法加强了十个档次。

[Upgrade quote 301]Dyson sphere.english: You've found a way to apply your knowledge of cosmic technology to slightly more local endeavors; this gigantic sphere of meta-materials, wrapping the solar system, is sure to kick your baking abilities up a notch.
[Upgrade quote 301]Dyson sphere.chinese: 你找到了一种方法，可以将你的宇宙技术知识应用到和你更相关的工作中来。这个巨大的超元材料球体包裹着太阳系，一定会让你的烘焙能力更上一层楼。

[Upgrade quote 302]Theory of atomic flui.english: Pushing alchemy to its most extreme limits, you find that everything is transmutable into anything else - lead to gold, mercury to water; more importantly, you realize that anything can -and should- be converted to cookies.
[Upgrade quote 302]Theory of atomic flui.chinese: 只要将炼金术发挥到极致，你就会发现一切都可以转化为其他任何东西——铅可以变成金、汞可以变成水；更重要的是，你意识到任何东西都可以——而且一定要——转化成饼干。

[Upgrade quote 304]Great loop hypothesis.english: What if our universe is just one instance of an infinite cycle? What if, before and after it, stretched infinite amounts of the same universe, themselves containing infinite amounts of cookies?
[Upgrade quote 304]Great loop hypothesis.chinese: 如果我们的宇宙只是一个无限循环的一个实例呢？如果在它之前和之后，延伸着无穷无尽的同一个宇宙，本身包含无穷无尽的饼干，那会怎样？

[Upgrade quote 305]The Pulse.english: You've tapped into the very pulse of the cosmos, a timeless rhythm along which every material and antimaterial thing beats in unison. This, somehow, means more cookies.
[Upgrade quote 305]The Pulse.chinese: 我们只是在宇宙的脉搏中活着，它保持着永恒的节奏，每一个物质和非物质的东西都沿着这个节奏一致地跳动。这——不知何故——意味着更多的饼干。

[Upgrade quote 306]Lux sanctorum.english: Your prism attendants have become increasingly mesmerized with something in the light - or maybe something beyond it; beyond us all, perhaps?
[Upgrade quote 306]Lux sanctorum.chinese: 你的棱镜维护员逐渐开始迷恋光里的影子——或许是超越光的存在；也可能是超越我们所有人的存在？

[Upgrade quote 307]The Unbridling.english: It might be a classic tale of bad parenting, but let's see where grandma is going with this.
[Upgrade quote 307]The Unbridling.chinese: 这可能是个典型失职父母的故事，但是还是看看老奶奶有什么打算吧。

[Upgrade quote 308]Wheat triffids.english:
Taking care of crops is so much easier when your plants can just walk about and help around the farm.
Do not pet. Do not feed. Do not attempt to converse with.
[Upgrade quote 308]Wheat triffids.chinese:
你的植物要是可以四处走动做做杂活，照顾农场就容易多了。
请不要向植物投食。不要试图与植物交谈。

[Upgrade quote 309]Canola oil wells.english: A previously untapped resource, canola oil permeates the underground olifers which grant it its particular taste and lucrative properties.
[Upgrade quote 309]Canola oil wells.chinese: 从未被开发的一种资源。菜籽油遍布在地下的橄榄树中，赋予它特殊的味道和让人难以拒绝的卖点。

[Upgrade quote 310]78-hour days.english: Why didn't we think of this earlier?
[Upgrade quote 310]78-hour days.chinese: 我们怎么没早想到这个方法呢？

[Upgrade quote 311]The stuff rationale.english: If not now, when? If not it, what? If not things... stuff?
[Upgrade quote 311]The stuff rationale.chinese: 此时不搏，更待何时？此事不平，何以平天下？此物非物……那它是啥来着？

[Upgrade quote 312]Theocracy.english:
You've turned your cookie empire into a perfect theocracy, gathering the adoration of zillions of followers from every corner of the universe.
Don't let it go to your head.
[Upgrade quote 312]Theocracy.chinese:
你把你的饼干帝国变成了一个完美的神权，聚集了来自宇宙每个角落的数十亿追随者的崇拜。
不要太过于沾沾自喜了。

[Upgrade quote 313]Rabbit trick.english:
Using nothing more than a fancy top hat, your wizards have found a way to simultaneously curb rabbit population and produce heaps of extra cookies for basically free!
Resulting cookies may or may not be fit for vegans.
[Upgrade quote 313]Rabbit trick.chinese:
你们的巫师们只用了一顶花哨的高帽，就找到了同时抑制兔子数量和生产大量额外饼干的方法，而且基本上零成本！
副作用就是这饼干可能不能算素食了。

[Upgrade quote 314]The final frontier.english: It's been a long road, getting from there to here. It's all worth it though - the sights are lovely and the oil prices slightly more reasonable.
[Upgrade quote 314]The final frontier.chinese: 从那里到这里是一条漫长的道路。不过这一路都是值得的——这里的风景很美，油价也比那里合理一些。

[Upgrade quote 315]Beige goo.english: Well now you've done it. Good job. Very nice. That's 3 galaxies you've just converted into cookies. Good thing you can hop from universe to universe.
[Upgrade quote 315]Beige goo.chinese: 行吧，一般人也干不出这事来。事已至此，我也只能说：干的漂亮，你把三个星系都变成了饼干。庆幸的是，你还是可以在宇宙之间穿梭。

[Upgrade quote 316]Maddening chants.english: A popular verse goes like so : "jau'hn madden jau'hn madden aeiouaeiouaeiou brbrbrbrbrbrbr"
[Upgrade quote 316]Maddening chants.chinese: 一句比较常见的诗词是这么说的：“龵冖，发狂吧。发狂吧，龵冖。啊婀伊呜淤啊婀伊呜淤啊婀伊呜淤，突突突突突突突突突。”

[Upgrade quote 317]Cookietopian moments.english: Reminiscing how things could have been, should have been, will have been.
[Upgrade quote 317]Cookietopian moments.chinese: 怀念以前的时光本来是怎样的，应该是怎样的，将会是怎样的。

[Upgrade quote 318]Some other super-tiny.english: When even the universe is running out of ideas, that's when you know you're nearing the end.
[Upgrade quote 318]Some other super-tiny.chinese: 当连宇宙都没有想法的时候，你就知道你已经接近尾声了。

[Upgrade quote 319]Reverse shadows.english: Oh man, this is really messing with your eyes.
[Upgrade quote 319]Reverse shadows.chinese: 好家伙，这快把你的眼睛都搞花了。

[Upgrade quote 321]Kitten specialists.english: optimeowzing your workflow like whoah, sir
[Upgrade quote 321]Kitten specialists.chinese: 正在努力优化你的工序喵，先生。

[Upgrade quote 322]Kitten experts.english: 10 years expurrrtise in the cookie business, sir
[Upgrade quote 322]Kitten experts.chinese: 我有十年做饼干生意的经验喵，先生。

[Upgrade quote 323]How to bake your drag.english: A tome full of helpful tips such as "oh god, stay away from it", "why did we buy this thing, it's not even house-broken" and "groom twice a week in the direction of the scales".
[Upgrade quote 323]How to bake your drag.chinese: 一本充满有用建议的文集，里面有《妈呀，可不要接近它》、《又不能毁灭一个小镇，我们买它来干啥》和《顺着龙鳞每日梳理两次》。

[Upgrade quote 324]A crumbly egg.english:
Thank you for adopting this robust, fun-loving cookie dragon! It will bring you years of joy and entertainment.
Keep in a dry and cool place, and away from other house pets. Subscription to home insurance is strongly advised.
[Upgrade quote 324]A crumbly egg.chinese:
感谢您领养这只健壮又好动的饼干龙！它会带给你好几年的喜悦和娱乐。
请保存在阴凉干燥处，远离其他家养宠物。强烈推荐购买住房保险。

[Upgrade quote 325]Chimera.english: More than the sum of its parts.

[Upgrade quote 326]Tin of butter cookies.english:
Five varieties of danish cookies.
Complete with little paper cups.
[Upgrade quote 326]Tin of butter cookies.chinese:
五种不同的丹麦饼干。
内含小纸杯。

[Upgrade quote 327]Golden switch.chinese: 更少的点击，更多的挂机。

[Upgrade quote 328]Classic dairy selecti.chinese: 据说有平缓心情的功效，正好治治你这牛脾气。

[Upgrade quote 329]Fanciful dairy select.english: Strong bones for the skeleton army.
[Upgrade quote 329]Fanciful dairy select.chinese: 骷髅军团指定补钙品。“腰不酸了腿不疼了，走路也有劲了，一口气上五楼，不费劲儿。”

[Upgrade quote 330]Dragon cookie.english: Imbued with the vigor and vitality of a full-grown cookie dragon, this mystical cookie will embolden your empire for the generations to come.
[Upgrade quote 330]Dragon cookie.chinese: 这块神秘的饼干被赋予了一条成熟的饼干龙的活力和生命力，它将助你的帝国源远流长。

[Upgrade quote 334]Milk chocolate butter.english:
Rewarded for owning 100 of everything.
It bears the engraving of a fine entrepreneur.
[Upgrade quote 334]Milk chocolate butter.chinese:
拥有 100 个所有建筑的奖励。
上面雕刻着一位优秀企业家的形象。

[Upgrade quote 335]Dark chocolate butter.english:
Rewarded for owning 150 of everything.
It is adorned with the image of an experienced cookie tycoon.
[Upgrade quote 335]Dark chocolate butter.chinese:
拥有 150 个所有建筑的奖励。
上面装饰着一个经验丰富的饼干大亨的形象。

[Upgrade quote 336]White chocolate butte.english:
Rewarded for owning 200 of everything.
The chocolate is chiseled to depict a masterful pastry magnate.
[Upgrade quote 336]White chocolate butte.chinese:
拥有 200 个所有建筑的奖励。
巧克力上刻着一个水平一流的糕点巨头。

[Upgrade quote 337]Ruby chocolate butter.english:
Rewarded for owning 250 of everything.
Covered in a rare red chocolate, this biscuit is etched to represent the face of a cookie industrialist gone mad with power.
[Upgrade quote 337]Ruby chocolate butter.chinese:
拥有 250 个所有建筑的奖励。
裹着罕见的红色巧克力外壳，这块饼干蚀刻着一个被权力冲昏头脑的饼干工业家的面容。

[Upgrade quote 339]Cinnamon cookies.english: The secret is in the patented swirly glazing.
[Upgrade quote 339]Cinnamon cookies.chinese: 秘诀就是受专利保护的漩涡糖衣。

[Upgrade quote 340]Vanity cookies.english: One tiny candied fruit sits atop this decadent cookie.
[Upgrade quote 340]Vanity cookies.chinese: 一个小小的水果蜜饯就放在这块颓废的饼干上面。

[Upgrade quote 341]Cigars.english: Close, but no match for those extravagant cookie straws they serve in coffee shops these days.
[Upgrade quote 341]Cigars.chinese: 跟现在咖啡店里的那些奢侈的饼干吸管比，还差点意思。

[Upgrade quote 342]Pinwheel cookies.english: Bringing you the dizzying combination of brown flavor and beige taste!
[Upgrade quote 342]Pinwheel cookies.chinese: 为您带来红糖风味和米纸口感的迷人混合!

[Upgrade quote 343]Fudge squares.english:
Not exactly cookies, but you won't care once you've tasted one of these.
They're so good, it's fudged-up!
[Upgrade quote 343]Fudge squares.chinese:
只要你尝过一口，你就不会在意这到底算不算饼干了。
这些实在是太好吃了。

[Upgrade quote 345]Butter horseshoes.english: It would behoove you to not overindulge in these.
[Upgrade quote 345]Butter horseshoes.chinese: 饼干卫生组织蹄醒您不要过度沉迷于这些。

[Upgrade quote 346]Butter pucks.english:
Lord, what fools these mortals be!
(This is kind of a hokey reference.)
[Upgrade quote 346]Butter pucks.chinese:
神啊，球球你看看这些愚蠢的凡人吧！
（这样也算是冰球梗吧。）

[Upgrade quote 347]Butter knots.english: Look, you can call these pretzels if you want, but you'd just be fooling yourself, wouldn't you?
[Upgrade quote 347]Butter knots.chinese: 听着，如果你要真愿意，叫这些卷饼也不是不可以，但你只是在自欺欺人，不是吗？

[Upgrade quote 348]Butter slabs.english: Nothing butter than a slab to the face.
[Upgrade quote 348]Butter slabs.chinese: 没有人能抵挡一板砖糊脸上的诱惑。

[Upgrade quote 349]Butter swirls.english: These are equal parts sugar, butter, and warm fuzzy feelings - all of which cause millions of deaths everyday.
[Upgrade quote 349]Butter swirls.chinese: 这些饼干是用等比的糖，黄油和暖心的感觉制成的——每种材料都是每天用上百万人的生命换来的。

[Upgrade quote 350]Shortbread biscuits.english: These rich butter cookies are neither short, nor bread. What a country!
[Upgrade quote 350]Shortbread biscuits.chinese: 这些黄油饼干既不是黄色的也不油腻。祖国万岁！

[Upgrade quote 351]Millionaires' shortbr.english: Three thought-provoking layers of creamy chocolate, hard-working caramel and crumbly biscuit in a poignant commentary of class struggle.
[Upgrade quote 351]Millionaires' shortbr.chinese: 三层发人深省的奶油巧克力、辛勤工作的焦糖和酥脆的饼干，是对阶级斗争的深刻描述。

[Upgrade quote 352]Caramel cookies.english: The polymerized carbohydrates adorning these cookies are sure to stick to your teeth for quite a while.
[Upgrade quote 352]Caramel cookies.chinese: 点缀这些饼干的聚合碳水化合物肯定会粘在你的牙齿上很长时间。

[Upgrade quote 353]Belphegor.english: A demon of shortcuts and laziness, Belphegor commands machines to do work in his stead.
[Upgrade quote 353]Belphegor.chinese: 投机取巧之魔，贝尔菲戈尔。他只会命令机器来代替他本该做的工作。

[Upgrade quote 354]Mammon.english: The demonic embodiment of wealth, Mammon requests a tithe of blood and gold from all his worshippers.
[Upgrade quote 354]Mammon.chinese: 作为财富的恶魔化身，玛门会从所有崇拜者那里夺取他们十分之一的鲜血和黄金。

[Upgrade quote 355]Abaddon.english: Master of overindulgence, Abaddon governs the wrinkler brood and inspires their insatiability.
[Upgrade quote 355]Abaddon.chinese: 地狱领主——从事专业放纵三千年——统治着饼干虫族并激发他们贪得无厌的欲望。

[Upgrade quote 356]Satan.english: The counterpoint to everything righteous, this demon represents the nefarious influence of deceit and temptation.
[Upgrade quote 356]Satan.chinese: 正义的对立面，这个恶魔代表了欺骗和诱惑的邪恶影响力。

[Upgrade quote 357]Asmodeus.english: This demon with three monstrous heads draws his power from the all-consuming desire for cookies and all things sweet.
[Upgrade quote 357]Asmodeus.chinese: 这个拥有三个巨大脑袋的恶魔从对饼干和甜食的极度渴望中汲取力量。

[Upgrade quote 358]Beelzebub.english: The festering incarnation of blight and disease, Beelzebub rules over the vast armies of pastry inferno.
[Upgrade quote 358]Beelzebub.chinese: 作为腐朽和疾病的化身，巴力西卜统治着一望无际的糕点地狱。

[Upgrade quote 359]Lucifer.english: Also known as the Lightbringer, this infernal prince's tremendous ego caused him to be cast down from pastry heaven.
[Upgrade quote 359]Lucifer.chinese: 别称光之使者，这位无间道王子膨胀的自负使他被糕点天堂流放至此。

[Upgrade quote 360]Golden cookie alert s.chinese: 这将是个掷地有声的选择。

[Upgrade quote 362]Basic wallpaper assor.english: Prioritizing aesthetics over crucial utilitarian upgrades? Color me impressed.
[Upgrade quote 362]Basic wallpaper assor.chinese: 所以……在这么多关键的进度升级里，你选了个纯外观升级？这可让我大开了眼界。

[Upgrade quote 363]Legacy.english: We've all been waiting for you.

[Upgrade quote 364]Elder spice.english: The cookie your cookie could smell like.
[Upgrade quote 364]Elder spice.chinese: 这才是你的饼干应有的味道。

[Upgrade quote 365]Residual luck.chinese: 财富与幸运需要从各种口味中发掘。

[Upgrade quote 366]Fantasteel mouse.english: You could be clicking using your touchpad and we'd be none the wiser.
[Upgrade quote 366]Fantasteel mouse.chinese: 你甚至可能在用触控板点饼干，毕竟我们也没办法知道你到底怎么点的。

[Upgrade quote 367]Nevercrack mouse.english: How much beefier can you make a mouse until it's considered a rat?
[Upgrade quote 367]Nevercrack mouse.chinese: 你觉得鼠标要做得多肥才会被当作真的老鼠？

[Upgrade quote 369]Future almanacs.english: Lets you predict optimal planting times. It's crazy what time travel can do!
[Upgrade quote 369]Future almanacs.chinese: 让你预测最佳播种时间。时光穿梭能做的事情实在是太多了!

[Upgrade quote 370]Rain prayer.english: A deeply spiritual ceremonial involving complicated dance moves and high-tech cloud-busting lasers.
[Upgrade quote 370]Rain prayer.chinese: 一个涉及复杂舞蹈动作与高科技破云激光的深入灵魂的仪式。

[Upgrade quote 371]Seismic magic.english: Surprise earthquakes are an old favorite of wizardly frat houses.
[Upgrade quote 371]Seismic magic.chinese: 巫师派对的重点项目莫过于惊喜地震了。

[Upgrade quote 372]Asteroid mining.english:
As per the 1974 United Cosmic Convention, comets, moons, and inhabited planetoids are no longer legally excavatable.
But hey, a space bribe goes a long way.
[Upgrade quote 372]Asteroid mining.chinese:
根据1974年《联合宇宙公约》，在彗星、卫星和有人居住的行星上的挖掘项目不再是合法项目了。
但是哈，贿赂在宇宙联盟中也很重要的呢。

[Upgrade quote 373]Quantum electronics.english: Your machines won't even be sure if they're on or off!
[Upgrade quote 373]Quantum electronics.chinese: 你的机器甚至都不太清楚自己到底是开着还是关着的了！

[Upgrade quote 374]Temporal overclocking.english: Introduce more quickitude in your system for increased speedation of fastness.
[Upgrade quote 374]Temporal overclocking.chinese: 在你的系统中植入更多的时速，以便加速这高速系统的极速能力。

[Upgrade quote 375]Contracts from beyond.english: Make sure to read the fine print!
[Upgrade quote 375]Contracts from beyond.chinese: 请务必仔细阅读注脚细则！

[Upgrade quote 376]Printing presses.english: Fake bills so real, they're almost worth the ink they're printed with.
[Upgrade quote 376]Printing presses.chinese: 假钞印得如此逼真，用来印刷它们的墨水成本几乎都快赶上假钞的面值了。

[Upgrade quote 377]Paganism.english: Some deities are better left unworshipped.
[Upgrade quote 377]Paganism.chinese: 有些神灵最好还是不要拜了。

[Upgrade quote 378]God particle.english: Turns out God is much tinier than we thought, I guess.
[Upgrade quote 378]God particle.chinese: 原来神比我们想象中要小很多，也可能是我想象中的太大了。

[Upgrade quote 379]Arcane knowledge.english: Some things were never meant to be known - only mildly speculated.
[Upgrade quote 379]Arcane knowledge.chinese: 有些事情本来就不应该被人知道——顶多就只应该简单地推测出来。

[Upgrade quote 380]Magical botany.english: Already known in some reactionary newspapers as "the wizard's GMOs".
[Upgrade quote 380]Magical botany.chinese: 一些爆料新闻社已经把这技术包装成了“巫师的转基因技术”。

[Upgrade quote 381]Fossil fuels.english:
Somehow better than plutonium for powering rockets.
Extracted from the fuels of ancient, fossilized civilizations.
[Upgrade quote 381]Fossil fuels.chinese:
不知道为什么比能钚合金提供更多的火箭推动力。
而且从古代化石文明的化石燃料中就能轻易提取。

[Upgrade quote 382]Shipyards.english: Where carpentry, blind luck, and asbestos insulation unite to produce the most dazzling spaceships on the planet.
[Upgrade quote 382]Shipyards.chinese: 找些木工、盲目的碰碰运气，再和绝缘石棉结合在一起，就能生产出全星球最耀眼的宇宙飞船。

[Upgrade quote 383]Primordial ores.english: Only when refining the purest metals will you extract the sweetest sap of the earth.
[Upgrade quote 383]Primordial ores.chinese: 只有在提炼最纯净的金属时，才能提取出地球上最甜的糖浆。

[Upgrade quote 384]Gold fund.english: If gold is the backbone of the economy, cookies, surely, are its hip joints.
[Upgrade quote 384]Gold fund.chinese: 如果黄金是经济的脊柱，那么饼干无疑是经济的胯骨。

[Upgrade quote 386]Abysmal glimmer.english:
Someone, or something, is staring back at you.
Perhaps at all of us.
[Upgrade quote 386]Abysmal glimmer.chinese:
有个人，或者有什么东西，正在光芒中看着你。
也可能是在看着我们所有人。

[Upgrade quote 387]Relativistic parsec-s.english:
People will tell you this isn't physically possible.
These are people you don't want on your ship.
[Upgrade quote 387]Relativistic parsec-s.chinese:
人们会告诉你这是违背物理的。
这些人是你不希望出现在你船上的。

[Upgrade quote 388]Primeval glow.english: From unending times, an ancient light still shines, impossibly pure and fragile in its old age.
[Upgrade quote 388]Primeval glow.chinese: 一道古老的光芒，从永无止境的时代开始，至今仍然闪耀着。在它时代的光芒中，有着难以置信的纯粹和脆弱。

[Upgrade quote 389]Extra physics funding.english: Time to put your money where your particle colliders are.
[Upgrade quote 389]Extra physics funding.chinese: 是时候在粒子对撞机上多花点钱了。

[Upgrade quote 390]Chemical proficiency.english: Discover exciting new elements, such as Fleshmeltium, Inert Shampoo Byproduct #17 and Carbon++!
[Upgrade quote 390]Chemical proficiency.chinese: 发现令人兴奋的新元素，例如牙釉质中存在的“䥺金属”、“17号惰性洗发水副产品” 和 “碳++”！

[Upgrade quote 391]Light magic.english: Actually not to be taken lightly! No, I'm serious. 178 people died last year. You don't mess around with magic.
[Upgrade quote 391]Light magic.chinese: 可不要被这技术的光明前途迷惑！我是说真的，178个人为这项技术献出了宝贵的生命。魔法可不是闹着玩的。

[Upgrade quote 392]Mystical energies.english: Something beckons from within the light. It is warm, comforting, and apparently the cause for several kinds of exotic skin cancers.
[Upgrade quote 392]Mystical energies.chinese: 有什么东西在光中轻柔的抚摸着接触到它的人，给人温暖且令人欣慰的感受。而且看起来也是几种特异皮肤癌的致癌源。

[Upgrade quote 395]Heavenly cookies.english: Baked with heavenly chips. An otherwordly flavor that transcends time and space.
[Upgrade quote 395]Heavenly cookies.chinese: 将天堂碎片揉进面团烘焙而成。一种超越时空的另类风味。

[Upgrade quote 396]Wrinkly cookies.english: The result of regular cookies left to age out for countless eons in a place where time and space are meaningless.
[Upgrade quote 396]Wrinkly cookies.chinese: 这是一个普通的饼干在一个时间和空间都毫无意义的地方被搁置了无数个纪元的结果。

[Upgrade quote 397]Distilled essence of.english: Tastes glittery. The empty phial makes for a great pencil holder.
[Upgrade quote 397]Distilled essence of.chinese: 有种闪闪发光味道。剩下的空瓶子可以当作一个很好的铅笔架。

[Upgrade quote 398]Occult obstruction.english: If symptoms persist, consult a doctor.
[Upgrade quote 398]Occult obstruction.chinese: 如果症状持续存在，请咨询医生。

[Upgrade quote 399]Glucose-charged air.english: Don't breathe too much or you'll get diabetes!
[Upgrade quote 399]Glucose-charged air.chinese: 不要呼吸太多，不然患糖尿病的几率会暴增!

[Upgrade quote 400]Lavender chocolate bu.english:
Rewarded for owning 300 of everything.
This subtly-flavored biscuit represents the accomplishments of decades of top-secret research. The molded design on the chocolate resembles a well-known entrepreneur who gave their all to the ancient path of baking.
[Upgrade quote 400]Lavender chocolate bu.chinese:
拥有 300 个所有建筑的奖励。
这种味道微妙的饼干代表了几十年来最高机密研究的成就。巧克力上刻印着一个著名的企业家的形象，他在烘焙的古老道路上奉献了自己的一生。

[Upgrade quote 403]Pecan sandies.english: Stick a nut on a cookie and call it a day! Name your band after it! Whatever!
[Upgrade quote 403]Pecan sandies.chinese: 放个胡桃仁在饼干上就完事了！剩下的时间爱干嘛干嘛！组个胡桃酥饼乐队唱两曲什么的！没人管的着！

[Upgrade quote 404]Moravian spice cookie.english: Popular for being the world's moravianest cookies.
[Upgrade quote 404]Moravian spice cookie.chinese: 因为是世界上最摩拉维亚的饼干而闻名。

[Upgrade quote 405]Anzac biscuits.english: Army biscuits from a bakery down under, containing no eggs but yes oats.
[Upgrade quote 405]Anzac biscuits.chinese: 一家上下颠倒的面包店制作的军团饼干，不含鸡蛋，但有燕麦。

[Upgrade quote 406]Buttercakes.english: Glistening with cholesterol, these cookies moistly straddle the line between the legal definition of a cookie and just a straight-up stick of butter.
[Upgrade quote 406]Buttercakes.chinese: 这些饼干闪烁着胆固醇的光芒，湿润地跨越了饼干的法律定义和一整根黄油之间的界限。

[Upgrade quote 407]Ice cream sandwiches.english: In an alternate universe, "ice cream sandwich" designates an ice cream cone filled with bacon, lettuce, and tomatoes. Maybe some sprinkles too.
[Upgrade quote 407]Ice cream sandwiches.chinese: 在异世界中，"冰激凌三明治"指的是一种在华夫卷筒里塞满培根、生菜和番茄的小吃。有的时候可能还会撒点彩糖。

[Upgrade quote 408]Stevia Caelestis.english: A plant of supernatural sweetness grown by angels in heavenly gardens.
[Upgrade quote 408]Stevia Caelestis.chinese: 由天使在天堂花园中培养的一种富含超自然糖浆的植物。

[Upgrade quote 409]Diabetica Daemonicus.english: A malevolent, if delicious herb that is said to grow on the cliffs of the darkest abyss of the underworld.
[Upgrade quote 409]Diabetica Daemonicus.chinese: 这种剧毒的草药，口感和味道却是鲜美可口。据说经常生长在阴间最黑暗的深渊悬崖上。

[Upgrade quote 410]Sucralosia Inutilis.english: A rare berry of uninteresting flavor that is as elusive as its uses are limited; only sought-after by the most avid collectors with too much wealth on their hands.
[Upgrade quote 410]Sucralosia Inutilis.chinese: 一种罕见的浆果，食之无味，弃之可惜，用途有限，难以捉摸；只有手上有用不完的财富的顶级狂热收藏家才会追捧。

[Upgrade quote 411]Lucky digit.english: This upgrade is a bit shy and only appears when your prestige level ends in 7.
[Upgrade quote 411]Lucky digit.chinese: 这项升级比较害羞，只有当你的威望等级以7结尾时才会出现。

[Upgrade quote 412]Lucky number.english: This upgrade is a reclusive hermit and only appears when your prestige level ends in 777.
[Upgrade quote 412]Lucky number.chinese: 这项升级是位隐居人士，只有当你的威望等级以777结尾时才会出现。

[Upgrade quote 413]Lucky payout.english: This upgrade took an oath of complete seclusion from the rest of the world and only appears when your prestige level ends in 777777.
[Upgrade quote 413]Lucky payout.chinese: 这项升级为了闭关修炼曾发誓与世隔绝，只有当你的威望等级以777777结尾时才会出现。

[Upgrade quote 415]Lucky grandmas.english: A fortunate grandma that always seems to find more cookies.
[Upgrade quote 415]Lucky grandmas.chinese: 一位幸运的老奶奶，似乎总是能找到更多的饼干。

[Upgrade quote 416]Your lucky cookie.english: This is the first cookie you've ever baked. It holds a deep sentimental value and, after all this time, an interesting smell.
[Upgrade quote 416]Your lucky cookie.chinese: 这是你烤过的第一块饼干，包含着爱与无尽的纪念价值。而且经过这么长时间了，闻起来还有一种有趣的味道。

[Upgrade quote 417]\"All Bets Are Off\".english: A coin that always lands on the other side when flipped. Not heads, not tails, not the edge. The other side.
[Upgrade quote 417]\"All Bets Are Off\".chinese: 一枚丢出去以后总是能另一面朝上的硬币。不是正面，不是反面，也不是能竖着立在侧面。是真的总是"另一面"。

[Upgrade quote 418]Winning lottery ticke.english: What lottery? THE lottery, that's what lottery! Only lottery that matters!
[Upgrade quote 418]Winning lottery ticke.chinese: 什么彩票？就是，"那一张"彩票! 在众多才票里唯一有价值的那张重要的彩票!

[Upgrade quote 419]Four-leaf clover fiel.english: No giant monsters here, just a whole lot of lucky grass.
[Upgrade quote 419]Four-leaf clover fiel.chinese: 这里没有巨大的怪物，只有一大堆的幸运草。

[Upgrade quote 420]A recipe book about b.english: Tip the scales in your favor with 28 creative new ways to cook the books.
[Upgrade quote 420]A recipe book about b.chinese: 轻松将优势拉向你自己这边，28种改写历史书的实用方法。

[Upgrade quote 421]Leprechaun village.english: You've finally become accepted among the local leprechauns, who lend you their mythical luck as a sign of friendship (as well as some rather foul-tasting tea).
[Upgrade quote 421]Leprechaun village.chinese: 你终于与当地的妖精们混熟了，他们把精灵神话中的运气借给你作为友谊的象征（还顺带附送了一些相当难喝的茶）。

[Upgrade quote 422]Improbability drive.english: A strange engine that turns statistics on their head. Recommended by the Grandmother's Guide to the Bakery.
[Upgrade quote 422]Improbability drive.chinese: 颠覆统计学的奇怪引擎。由《老奶奶的面包店指南》倾心推荐。

[Upgrade quote 423]Antisuperstistronics.english: An exciting new field of research that makes unlucky things lucky. No mirror unbroken, no ladder unwalked under!
[Upgrade quote 423]Antisuperstistronics.chinese: 一个令人兴奋的新研究领域，可以使不吉利的东西变得幸运。从此再也没有没踩过的井盖！

[Upgrade quote 424]Gemmed talismans.english: Good-luck charms covered in ancient and excruciatingly rare crystals. A must have for job interviews!
[Upgrade quote 424]Gemmed talismans.chinese: 覆盖着稀有的远古水晶吉祥物。求职面试的必备之物!

[Upgrade quote 425]Kitten consultants.english: glad to be overpaid to work with you, sir
[Upgrade quote 425]Kitten consultants.chinese: 很高兴能被您高薪聘请，老板。

[Upgrade quote 426]Birthday cookie.english:
Thank you for playing Cookie Clicker!
-Orteil

[Upgrade quote 427]Armythril mouse.english: This one takes about 53 people to push it around and another 48 to jump down on the button and trigger a click. You could say it's got some heft to it.
[Upgrade quote 427]Armythril mouse.chinese: 这只鼠标需要大约53个人才能推动它，还另外需要48人同时跳在按键上才能点击。你可以说它是有一些重量的。

[Upgrade quote 428]Reverse dementia.english: Extremely unsettling, and somehow even worse than the regular kind.
[Upgrade quote 428]Reverse dementia.chinese: 散发着极其令人不安的气息，而且不知为何比普通的痴呆更糟糕。

[Upgrade quote 429]Humane pesticides.english: Made by people, for people, from people and ready to unleash some righteous scorching pain on those pesky insects that so deserve it.
[Upgrade quote 429]Humane pesticides.chinese: 由人制造，为人制造，从人制造，随时可以将那些讨厌的虫子置于正义的炽热痛苦之中。这是它们应得的。

[Upgrade quote 430]Mole people.english: Engineered from real human beings within your very labs, these sturdy little folks have a knack for finding the tastiest underground minerals in conditions that more expensive machinery probably wouldn't survive.
[Upgrade quote 430]Mole people.chinese: 这些坚固的小家伙是在你自己的实验室里由真人设计的，它们善于在更昂贵的机器可能无法生存的条件下寻找最美味的地下矿物。

[Upgrade quote 431]Machine learning.english: You figured you might get better productivity if you actually told your workers to learn how to work the machines. Sometimes, it's the little things...
[Upgrade quote 431]Machine learning.chinese: 你想，如果你真的让你的工人学习如何操作机器，你可能会得到更好的生产力。有时，细节决定成败……

[Upgrade quote 432]Edible money.english: It's really quite simple; you make all currency too delicious not to eat, solving world hunger and inflation in one fell swoop!
[Upgrade quote 432]Edible money.chinese: 原理其实很简单：你只要把所有的货币都做得美味到赞不绝口，就能一举解决世界饥饿和通货膨胀问题!

[Upgrade quote 433]Sick rap prayers.english: With their ill beat and radical rhymes, these way-hip religious tunes are sure to get all the youngins who thought they were 2 cool 4 church back on the pews and praying for more! Wicked!
[Upgrade quote 433]Sick rap prayers.chinese: 只要有这种紧凑的节拍和激进的韵律，这些宗教曲调肯定会让所有认为自己在教堂里不受欢迎的年轻人重新回到座位上，并为更多的人祈祷! 太棒了!

[Upgrade quote 434]Deluxe tailored wands.english: In this age of science, most skillful wand-makers are now long gone; but thankfully - not all those wanders are lost.
[Upgrade quote 434]Deluxe tailored wands.chinese: 在这个科学时代，大多数老字号的魔杖制造商现在早已不在了；但值得庆幸的是——有些已经制造出来的魔杖还在这个世界上。

[Upgrade quote 435]Autopilot.english: Your ships are now fitted with completely robotic crews! It's crazy how much money you save when you don't have to compensate the families of those lost in space.
[Upgrade quote 435]Autopilot.chinese: 你的飞船船员现在已经完全由机器人替代了! 当你不必赔偿那些在太空中失踪的人的家属时，能省下的钱简直爽翻。

[Upgrade quote 436]The advent of chemist.english: You know what? That whole alchemy nonsense was a load of baseless rubbish. Dear god, what were you thinking?
[Upgrade quote 436]The advent of chemist.chinese: 你知道吗？所谓的炼金术都是一堆毫无根据胡说八道出来的垃圾。妈耶，你之前到底在想什么？

[Upgrade quote 437]The real world.english: It turns out that our universe is actually the twisted dimension of another, saner plane of reality. Time to hop on over there and loot the place!
[Upgrade quote 437]The real world.chinese: 事实证明，我们的宇宙实际上是另一个更合理的现实平面的扭曲维度。是时候穿越到那里去洗劫一番了!

[Upgrade quote 438]Second seconds.english: That's twice as many seconds in the same amount of time! What a deal! Also, what in god's name!
[Upgrade quote 438]Second seconds.chinese: 这可是能让1分钟有120秒的技术！超划算啊！喔，我说的这是什么鬼？

[Upgrade quote 439]Quantum comb.english: Quantum entanglement is one of those things that are so annoying to explain that we might honestly be better off without it. This is finally possible thanks to the quantum comb!
[Upgrade quote 439]Quantum comb.chinese: 量子纠缠是解释起来非常烦人的东西之一，说实话，这世界上要是没有它可能会更美好。不过多亏了量子梳子，终于让消灭量子纠缠成为可能了。

[Upgrade quote 440]Crystal mirrors.english: Designed to filter more light back into your prisms, reaching levels of brightness that reality itself had never planned for.
[Upgrade quote 440]Crystal mirrors.chinese: 旨在过滤更多的光线回到你的棱镜中，达到现实本身从未达到过的亮度水平。

[Upgrade quote 441]Bunnypedes.english: You've taken to breeding rabbits with hundreds of paws, which makes them intrinsically very lucky and thus a very handy (if very disturbing) pet.
[Upgrade quote 441]Bunnypedes.chinese: 你杂交出了有上百只爪子的兔子。所以这种兔子从本质上来说就自带超多的幸运（就是看起来有些猎奇罢了）。

[Upgrade quote 442]Kitten assistants to.english: nothing stresses meowt... except having to seek the approval of my inferiors, sir
[Upgrade quote 442]Kitten assistants to.chinese: 没有什么能让我感到压力的事情……只要我让我不耻下问去找征求那些下等猫的意见，先生。

[Upgrade quote 443]Charm quarks.chinese: 大家都想要你的幸运符夸克！

[Upgrade quote 444]Pink biscuits.english: One of the oldest cookies. Traditionally dipped in champagne to soften it, because the French will use any opportunity to drink.
[Upgrade quote 444]Pink biscuits.chinese: 最古老的饼干种类之一。传统的吃法是首先将饼干蘸进香槟酒里，因为法国人不会错过任何一个能喝酒的机会。

[Upgrade quote 445]Whole-grain cookies.english: Covered in seeds and other earthy-looking debris. Really going for that "5-second rule" look.
[Upgrade quote 445]Whole-grain cookies.chinese: 上面撒满了各种坚果种子和黄土土的渣渣。简直就是朝着“三秒定律”的风格做的。

[Upgrade quote 446]Candy cookies.english: These melt in your hands just a little bit.
[Upgrade quote 446]Candy cookies.chinese: 这些被拿起来的时候会融化一点点，粘在手上黏黏的。

[Upgrade quote 447]Big chip cookies.english: You are in awe at the size of these chips. Absolute units.
[Upgrade quote 447]Big chip cookies.chinese: 这些巧克力豆很大，你忍一下。

[Upgrade quote 449]Sugar baking.english: To bake with the sugary essence of eons themselves, you must first learn to take your sweet time.
[Upgrade quote 449]Sugar baking.chinese: 要用年代本身的糖分精华来烘烤饼干，你必须首先学会把握好你的甜蜜时光。

[Upgrade quote 450]Sugar craving.english: Just a little kick to sweeten the deal.
[Upgrade quote 450]Sugar craving.chinese: 只需一点点甜即可满足。

[Upgrade quote 453]Sprinkles cookies.english: A bit of festive decorating helps hide the fact that this might be one of the blandest cookies you've ever tasted.
[Upgrade quote 453]Sprinkles cookies.chinese: 撒上一点有节庆气息的装饰来掩盖这种饼干过于平淡无味的事实。

[Upgrade quote 454]Peanut butter blossom.comment: 不建议谷歌chocolate squirt是啥，翻译我直接重写了个无害一点的
[Upgrade quote 454]Peanut butter blossom.english: Topped with a scrumptious chocolate squirt, which is something we really wish we didn't just write.
[Upgrade quote 454]Peanut butter blossom.chinese: 上面的巧克力利用了一种将巧克力注入牙膏管内然后挤到饼干上的高级点缀技巧。

[Upgrade quote 455]No-bake cookies.english: You have no idea how these mysterious oven-less treats came to be or how they hold their shape. You're thinking either elephant glue or cold fusion.
[Upgrade quote 455]No-bake cookies.chinese: 你完全想象不到这些神秘的免烤箱点心是怎么做成的，也不知道它们是如何保持形状的。你觉得不是掺了502就是冷核聚变。

[Upgrade quote 456]Florentines.english: These make up for being the fruitcake of cookies by at least having the decency to feature chocolate.
[Upgrade quote 456]Florentines.chinese: 这些饼干至少有巧克力的加持，从而弥补了水果蛋糕的不足。

[Upgrade quote 457]Chocolate crinkles.english: Non-denominational cookies to celebrate year-round deliciousness, and certainly not Christmas or some other nonsense.
[Upgrade quote 457]Chocolate crinkles.chinese: 适合用于全年庆祝美味感受的无信仰饼干。绝对不是用来庆祝圣诞节或者什么有的没的。

[Upgrade quote 458]Maple cookies.english: Made with syrup from a land where milk comes in bags, instead of spontaneously pooling at the bottom of your screen depending on your achievements.
[Upgrade quote 458]Maple cookies.chinese: 用一种特殊的糖浆制成。这种糖浆盛产于一个用塑料袋装牛奶的地方，而不是像正常人一样根据成就获得的进度倒进屏幕里。

[Upgrade quote 460]Technobsidian mouse.english: A highly advanced mouse of a sophisticated design. Only one thing on its mind : to click.
[Upgrade quote 460]Technobsidian mouse.chinese: 一款设计先进的智能鼠标。它只考虑一件事：点击。

[Upgrade quote 621]Fortune #001.english: Fingers are not the only thing you can count on.
[Upgrade quote 621]Fortune #001.chinese: 你的手指并不是你唯一可以依靠的东西。

[Upgrade quote 622]Fortune #002.english: A wrinkle is a crack in a mundane facade.
[Upgrade quote 622]Fortune #002.chinese: 皱纹只是是平凡外表上的一个裂缝。

[Upgrade quote 623]Fortune #003.english: The seeds of tomorrow already lie within the seeds of today.
[Upgrade quote 623]Fortune #003.chinese: 明日的希望已经在今天希望过了。

[Upgrade quote 624]Fortune #004.english: Riches from deep under elevate you all the same.
[Upgrade quote 624]Fortune #004.chinese: 来自地下深处的财富同样可以升华。

[Upgrade quote 625]Fortune #005.english: True worth is not in what you find, but in what you make.
[Upgrade quote 625]Fortune #005.chinese: 真正的价值不在于你找到了什么，而在于你创造了什么。

[Upgrade quote 626]Fortune #006.english: The value of money means nothing to a pocket.
[Upgrade quote 626]Fortune #006.chinese: 钱的价值对钱包来说毫无意义。

[Upgrade quote 627]Fortune #007.chinese: 不是所有的指点迷津都值得崇拜。

[Upgrade quote 628]Fortune #008.english: Magic is about two things - showmanship, and rabbits.
[Upgrade quote 628]Fortune #008.chinese: 魔术就是两种事物的结合——演技和兔子。

[Upgrade quote 629]Fortune #009.english: Every mile travelled expands the mind by just as much.
[Upgrade quote 629]Fortune #009.chinese: 每走一里路都会使人的眼界得到同样程度的拓展。

[Upgrade quote 630]Fortune #010.english: Don't get used to yourself. You're gonna have to change.
[Upgrade quote 630]Fortune #010.chinese: 不要习惯现状。你必须要改变。

[Upgrade quote 631]Fortune #011.english: Every doorway is a gamble. Tread with care.
[Upgrade quote 631]Fortune #011.chinese: 每条门路都是一场赌博。警觉而行。

[Upgrade quote 632]Fortune #012.english: Do your future self a favor; they'll thank you for it.
[Upgrade quote 632]Fortune #012.chinese: 帮你未来的自己一个忙；未来的你会为此感谢你的。

[Upgrade quote 633]Fortune #013.english: The world is made of what we put into it.
[Upgrade quote 633]Fortune #013.chinese: 世界是由我们的付出构成的。

[Upgrade quote 634]Fortune #014.english: Staring at a dazzling light can blind you back to darkness.
[Upgrade quote 634]Fortune #014.chinese: 紧盯着耀眼的光芒，会让你盲目地回到黑暗中。

[Upgrade quote 635]Fortune #015.english: Don't leave to blind chance what you could accomplish with deaf skill.
[Upgrade quote 635]Fortune #015.chinese: 不要盲目等待机会，全力发挥你耳聋的优势。

[Upgrade quote 636]Fortune #016.english: It's good to see yourself in others. Remember to see yourself in yourself, too.
[Upgrade quote 636]Fortune #016.chinese: 在别人身上看到自己的影子是件好事。但记住也要在自己身上看到自己影子。

[Upgrade quote 637]Fortune #017.english: If things aren't working out for you, rewrite the rules.

[Upgrade quote 638]Fortune #100.english: True wealth is counted in gifts.
[Upgrade quote 638]Fortune #100.chinese: 真正的财富是收礼收出来的。

[Upgrade quote 639]Fortune #101.english: Some people dream of fortunes; others dream of cookies.
[Upgrade quote 639]Fortune #101.chinese: 有些人梦想拥有财富；有些人梦想拥有饼干。

[Upgrade quote 640]Fortune #102.english: Help, I'm trapped in a browser game!
[Upgrade quote 640]Fortune #102.chinese: 救命！我被困在一个页游中了！

[Upgrade quote 641]Fortune #103.english: Don't believe the superstitions; all cats are good luck.
[Upgrade quote 641]Fortune #103.chinese: 不要相信迷信，所有猫都会带来好运。

[Upgrade quote 643]Fortune cookies.english: These don't taste all that great but that's not really the point, is it?
[Upgrade quote 643]Fortune cookies.chinese: 这些东西的味道并不是很好，但这并不是重点，你说是不是？

[Upgrade quote 698]Fortune #018.english: There's plenty of everyone, but only one of you.
[Upgrade quote 698]Fortune #018.chinese: 世界上有很多的大家，但却只有一个你自己。

[Achievement quote 77]Fortune.english: You should really go to bed.
[Achievement quote 77]Fortune.chinese: 讲真的，你该上床睡觉了。

[Achievement quote 78]True Neverclick.english: This kinda defeats the whole purpose, doesn't it?
[Achievement quote 78]True Neverclick.chinese: 这游戏大概不是这么玩的吧？

[Achievement quote 80]Elder slumber.chinese:
我们的心灵
无尽的延续
超越了宇宙

[Achievement quote 86]Nihilism.english:
There are many things
that need to be erased
[Achievement quote 86]Nihilism.chinese:
很多事物
本不应该存在

[Achievement quote 127]Lord of Construct.english: He saw the vast plains stretching ahead of him, and he said : let there be civilization.
[Achievement quote 127]Lord of Construct.chinese: 他放眼望着广阔的平原。许久，他说："这里需要文明、这里需要社会。"

[Achievement quote 128]Lord of Progress.english: One can always do better. But should you?
[Achievement quote 128]Lord of Progress.chinese: 总有人要当废物，那为什么不能是你呢？

[Achievement quote 132]Tiny cookie.english:
These aren't the cookies
you're clicking for.
[Achievement quote 132]Tiny cookie.chinese:
这些饼干
不是你该点的。

[Achievement quote 133]You win a cookie.english: We're all so proud of you.
[Achievement quote 133]You win a cookie.chinese: 如此成就。大家都为你骄傲。

[Achievement quote 159]God complex.english: But that's not you, is it?

[Achievement quote 160]Third-party.english: Some find vanilla to be the most boring flavor.
[Achievement quote 160]Third-party.chinese: 有些人觉得，雪糕只有奶油味的话最无趣了。

[Achievement quote 162]Nil zero zilch.english: To summarize : really not very much at all.
[Achievement quote 162]Nil zero zilch.chinese: 细数一下的话，其实没有多少。

[Achievement quote 163]Transcendence.english: Your cookies are now on a higher plane of being.
[Achievement quote 163]Transcendence.chinese: 你的饼干大概已经是更高一层的存在了。

[Achievement quote 164]Obliterate.chinese: 不要做无谓的抵抗，虽然看你努力的样子的确很滑稽。

[Achievement quote 165]Negative void.english: You now have so few cookies that it's almost like you have a negative amount of them.
[Achievement quote 165]Negative void.chinese: 你现在饼干数量少的简直跟负数一样。

[Achievement quote 204]Here you go.english: All you had to do was ask.
[Achievement quote 204]Here you go.chinese: 你要是早点开口，我就早给你了。

[Achievement quote 229]In the mouth of m.english: A cookie is just what we tell each other it is.
[Achievement quote 229]In the mouth of m.chinese: 饼干，不过是人类之间传播的一个名词罢了。

[Achievement name 234]Cookiehertz : a re.comment: 这个Cookiehertz应该是Cookie hurts的谐音。引文中的a hertz donut也能查到相关的谐音梗'it hurts, don't it?'
[Achievement name 234]Cookiehertz : a re.english: Cookiehertz : a really, really tasty hertz
[Achievement name 234]Cookiehertz : a re.chinese: 热疼疼的饼干：痛并美味着

[Achievement quote 234]Cookiehertz : a r.english: Tastier than a hertz donut, anyway.
[Achievement quote 234]Cookiehertz : a r.chinese: 营养丰富。而且至少比维生素C泡疼片更有味。

[Achievement quote 236]Turbopuns.english: Mother Nature will be like "slowwwww dowwwwwn".
[Achievement quote 236]Turbopuns.chinese: 大自然母亲大概会说："车太快了，慢点开吧。"

[Achievement quote 243]Tabloid addiction.english:
Page 6: Mad individual clicks on picture of pastry in a futile attempt to escape boredom!
Also page 6: British parliament ate my baby!
[Achievement quote 243]Tabloid addiction.chinese:
第六页：城市娱乐活动逐渐单调化。为缓解无聊，本地一疯子狂点一张甜点的照片。
还是第六页：英国议会吃了我的孩子！
